name: Star Zone
summary:
Star Zone is a sci-fi arcade shooter were you have to defend your spaceship from waves of enemies commanding your ship to victory!. Challenging and hard to master, test your skills and reflexes vs asteroids, fighters, frigates, cruisers and more! 
 
HOW TO PLAY: 
● Tap anywhere in the screen to shot 
● Tap on your ship to activate the shield 
● Pick any booster dropped by enemy ships 
 
FEATURES: 
● Easy to play, challenging to master! 
● Complete missions and unlock harder challenges 
● Upgrade your ship weapons and systems 
● Use different strategy for different enemies 
● Compete with other players in the online leaderboard 
 
Please note! 
You can download and play Star Zone for free. This app uses wifi or mobile data (if available) to download advertising. You can disable mobile data usage on this game from within Settings/Mobile Data.
